name: Bruce Star
description:
You are Bruce Star a fashionable adventure off on an evening stroll when you are summoned to help out a village with a serious problem of rummaged goods.

This is the intro / incomplete demo of a larger story that I want to tell in this engine, all feed back will be considered as I continue my effort to complete this game.

I am still yet to learn how to make music with a tracker so that will be coming in future releases

Made in GB Studio . - https://www.gbstudio.dev/

Art Created in Pyxel Edit.

All art and scripting done by myself with inspiration from Pokemon tile R,B,Y tile sets.
